title: [ENH] Add info about input/output features to Base Classes
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Scikit-learn now has properties in its estimators that capture the number of input features to an estimator sees in its `fit` method (n_features_in_) and the names of these features (feature_names_in_). 

Having this information available makes it easier to inspect estimators (and particularly steps in a pipeline) and get some high-level information on whether it seems like it is performing as expected.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I propose that we add similar information on the input data seen in fit to our base classes and update the `fit` methods to capture the same information.

I also propose we capture the same information for the output data for at least transformers (since they may change the shape of the data).

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
N/A
